patchNotes.title: Talent rework and small-hero rework

texts.text: If Dehaka uses Brushstalker and the cooldown is bug reset a message on the game chat will say 'I failed to adapt'

general.developerCommentary: There's currently a bug that when Dehaka uses Brushstalker on a bush on his own hitbox he will perform the Brushstalker but will have his cooldown reset so instead of fixing it im going for a joke

patchNotes.developerCommentary: Dehaka is a pretty solid character BUT that doesn't mean it brings to the table all the things of how Dehaka should feel based on the experience from Sc2 specially when we compare of how Dehaka acts as a commander on the PvE mode. My main goals is here is to bring off some of the vertical talent builds if possible and bringing some of the Kaiju aspect got from the PvE mode.

changes.name: New: <modified, talents, 1, 0>

texts.text: Quest: Collect essence. Reward:Dehaka gets 0.5% bigger for every 50 essence collected up to 25%
subtexts: This will increase his size, basic attack range, skills radius and range by that amount
This will count even exceeding essences
This will increase Dehaka Hitbox (1.0) to be the same as Deathwing (1.25)

changes.developerCommentary: The objective here is mean't to be Kaiju based similar to how he is portrayed on the coop missions from SC2

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 0>

texts.text: Removed

changes.developerCommentary: I mixed it's effects on other Dark Swarm talents to prevent vertical builds and priorize variety

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 1>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Exceeding essence will be automatically used by Dehaka

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to make it more competitive with the other talents but on other way without going for numerical changes

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1> renamed to <modified, talents, 7, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Drag against troops or non-boss mercenaries will turn them unkillable during the drag duration and will grab enemies around the target
subtexts: The unkillable is to the enemy unit to prevent extremely hard setups for this talent with it dying
Radius is 2.5 | <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1, muradin> is 3.0

texts.text: After that duration it will instantly kill the primary target

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to make a playmaking tool for Drag but didn't want it to be eazily abused so i made a level 7 spike for that type of talent mixing two talents i wanted to create.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Every time Dark Swarm hits an enemy hero it also extends Brushstalker duration by 0.5 second if it's active
subtexts: Only increase the duration one time per damage tick

changes.developerCommentary: This change is made to make 2ยบ option talent for picking <vanilla, talents, 13, 0> without the need of <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 10, 1>

texts.text: moved to level 16

changes.developerCommentary: For me this feels like a strong talent rather than a ultimate and that's the most important WHY i am changing it

changes.name: NEW: Intimidating Roar

texts.text: After 0.75 second Dehaka terrifies nearby enemies, reducing their movement speed by 75%  for 3 seconds.
subtexts: Radius is 7.0 | <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1, blaze> is 6.5

changes.developerCommentary: After seeing the Kaiju effect on Starcraft 2 i feel it as a MUST HAVE for Dehaka

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Basic Attacks also slow by 0.4% for 1 second per Essence

changes.developerCommentary: Buffing it a little to make it more competitive with <vanilla, talents, 13, 0> while also covering the removal of <vanilla, talents, 20, 2>

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 1>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Dehaka receive 25 spell armor while Dark Swarm is active and also extends it's duration by 0.2 with every enemy hero hit.

changes.developerCommentary: With the removal of <vanilla, talents, 1, 0> and changes to <vanilla, talents, 10, 1> i am buffing changing that talent to cover it.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 0>

texts.text: Removed

changes.developerCommentary: With the new <modified, talents, 1, 0> talent on level 1 this is not necessary anymore

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 10, 1>

texts.text: Moved from level 10.
Reduced healing from 100% to 75%

changes.developerCommentary: Bringing it to 16 as a powerhouse of utility choices

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Moved from level 20.
Brushstalker cooldown reduction reduced from 50 to 35

changes.developerCommentary: Made level 20 a place where how you want to customize your kaiju so there's no place for a talent like this

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 2>

texts.text: Removed.

changes.developerCommentary: by bringing <modified, talents, 16, 2> to level 16 this doesn't feel necessary anymore

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 20, 1>

texts.text: Intimidating Roar will reduce enemy heroes armor by 25.

changes.developerCommentary: The area is enormous and that effect is strong combined with such a strong slow

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 20, 2>

texts.text: Leap to target location after 0.5 seconds, dealing 246 damage to enemies on landing also stunning them for 0.25.
subtexts: Same characteristics as <vanilla, talents, 10, 0, sonya> but with 50 seconds cooldown

changes.developerCommentary: Even tho we could argue that it overlaps with <vanilla, talents, 10, 0, sonya> it's not something that would bother that much as it's not an ultimate powerhouse

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Dehaka's fiery breath scorches the earth, creating a scorching area, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds and reducing 50% healing on the area.The area lasts 4 seconds.
subtexts: Vector skill similar to <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1, probius>
Width 3.0 and Height 8.0 | <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1, probius> has Width 1.0 and 8.0 Height

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to bring SC2 Scorching Breath bu

texts.text: Moved to 16

changes.developerCommentary: Not kaiju contender not level 20 tier

texts.text: Removed

changes.developerCommentary: Mixed <vanilla, talents, 20, 2> into <modified, talents, 13, 2> as i never felt that talent were a strong 20 contender and with the removal of <vanilla, talents, 10, 1> from the ultimate pool the <vanilla, talents, 20, 1> has no place anymore
